nodes.text: Candoria was a depopulated planet located in the Colonies region of the galaxy.

About twenty years before the Clone Wars, in 46 BBY, the population of Candoria, along with those of its colonies, was eradicated by the Blue Shadow Virus. The disease was later known as the Candorian plague. The plague seemed to have disappeared on Candoria, but was introduced to Dentaal by the Empire in 0 ABY.
